subject: fix: skip malformed commits and add defensive null checks
body:
Dashboard was breaking because 65 processed commits were missing required
fields (timestamp, author_id). JavaScript errors halted execution before
the compare dropdown event listener was attached.

Changes:
- aggregate-processed.js: Add validateCommit() to skip incomplete commits
- dashboard/index.html: Add null guard in getWorkPattern() for timestamps
- dashboard/index.html: Add renderSummary() on Overview tab switch

Skipped commits: model-pear (53), repo-tor (11), social-ad-creator (1)

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GTJnfM2q8ybazZtZ1Y54fg
title: skip malformed commits and add defensive null checks
